_header: He gave himself as good fellow
_description: The Lowliness of Christ — eight lines

BLHar2316.First Lines: He yaf himself as good felaweWhan he was boren in wre wede…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …In heuene as king we schulen him knoweQwan he him self schal yiuen in mede
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.121.
